title: Snowline
subtitle: A calm entry point to your web search

sections.title: Welcome to Snowline
sections.text: Snowline is a minimalist search app that offers a clear, focused way to start exploring the web.

sections.title: Search without distractions
sections.text: Focus on what matters. Snowline reduces visual noise and helps you reach relevant results quickly.

sections.title: Privacy & performance
